judges: Being, Calogero, Dennis, Grant, Theft, Under, Watson
case_name_full: STATE of Louisiana v. Alfredia MORMAN
attorneys: William J. Guste, Jr., Atty. Gen., Barbara Rutledge, Asst. Atty. Gen., Leon H. Whit-ten, Dist. Atty., George H. Meadors, Asst. Dist. Atty., for plaintiff-appellee.', Robert E. Piper, Jr., Piper & Brown, Shreveport, for defendant-appellant.

opinions.opinion_text:
PER CURIAM.
Affirmed.
CALOGERO, DENNIS and WATSON, JJ., dissent.
CALOGERO & DENNIS, J.J., would grant a rehearing.
WATSON, J., would grant the rehearing, being of the opinion that defendant should have been sentenced under R.S. 14:27(D)(2) for attempted theft.
